content.query:
ALTER TABLE  DW.DIM_CIGAM_CLIENTE add CONSTRAINT PK_DIM_CIGAM_CLIENTE PRIMARY KEY NONCLUSTERED (SK_CLIENTE) NOT ENFORCED
ALTER TABLE  DW.DIM_CIGAM_PRODUTO add CONSTRAINT PK_DIM_CIGAM_PRODUTO PRIMARY KEY NONCLUSTERED (SK_PRODUTO) NOT ENFORCED
ALTER TABLE  DW.DIM_CIGAM_LOJA add CONSTRAINT PK_DIM_CIGAM_LOJA PRIMARY KEY NONCLUSTERED (SK_LOJA) NOT ENFORCED

ALTER TABLE  DW.DIM_CIGAM_VENDEDOR add CONSTRAINT PK_DIM_CIGAM_VENDEDOR PRIMARY KEY NONCLUSTERED (SK_VENDEDOR) NOT ENFORCED

ALTER TABLE  DW.DIM_CALENDARIO add CONSTRAINT PK_DIM_CALENDARIO PRIMARY KEY NONCLUSTERED (SK_DATA) NOT ENFORCED
